member.name: F:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.Driver.name
member.summary: Friendly name used in debugging. This comes from the Name property of the System.Type instance.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.Driver.pnpSignature
member.summary: The PNP device ID (hardware, model, class, etc.) that this device driver definition binds to.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.Driver.configClass
member.summary: The PNP config class defined in metadata (class with SignatureAttribute).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.Driver.metadata
member.summary: The XML metadata for this driver. -XXX- Which element?

member.name: F:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.Driver.imagePath
member.summary: The binary / image path for the executable. This field is only non-null for process drivers (not in-kernel drivers).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.Driver.instanceCount
member.summary: The number of instances of this device driver.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.Driver.DriversTable
member.summary:
Key: string! PNP device ID Value: Driver! driver
List of registered drivers. A given driver can be in this list more than once, if that driver can match more than one device ID.
